publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3246 Trish Godman on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of Scottish Public Services Deputy Ombudsmanâ€”That the Parliament nominates Ms Carolyn Hirst to Her Majesty the Queen for appointment as Scottish Public Services Deputy Ombudsman. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh*, Donald Gorrie*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
